name: SmurfoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, open smurf of the day”
”Alexa, start smurf of the day”
”Alexa, launch smurf of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smurf of the day
des:
Smurf of the Day is a fun skill to see which Smurf you get to be for the day.

This is a fun little skill for the entire family to enjoy. There are currently 40 Smurfs in this skill, in which Alexa will randomly choose one for you each day. Every Smurf is either part of the cartoon, comics, or movies. Which Smurf will you be today? Play the skill each day to see who!

You can say:

"Alexa, open Smurf of the Day"
"Alexa, start Smurf of the Day"
"Alexa, launch Smurf of the Day"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
